item.title: 6.6.1 Document Type
item.description: Document Type # To view Document types, do the following: Click on Manage > Document > Document Type. Create # To add a new Document Type - Paper do the following: Step 1: Click Create Document Type - Paper Step 2: A dialog box appears: Name: Enter the name of the Document Type - Paper Description: Add detailed description for Document Type - Paper.

item.title: 6.6.2 Document
item.description: Document manage # To view Documents manage, do the following: Click on Manage > Document > Document manage. Create # To add a new Document - Paper do the following: Step 1: Click on Create Document - Papers Step 2: A dialog box appears: Name: Enter the name of the Document Type - Paper Type: Select the type of paper to add to the document.
